mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over(order by product_id) as rownum, p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_weight, p.product_info, p.product_price, p.product_stock, p.product_image, c.category_type, c.category_acidity, c.category_aroma, c.category_body, c.category_sweet from product as p, category as c where p.product_id = c.product_id and c.category_type like #{category_type}) A where rownum <= #{rowCount} and rownum >= #{start}
select count(*) as totalCount from product as p, category as c where p.product_id = c.product_id and c.category_type like #{category_type}
select product_id, product_name, product_weight, product_info, product_price, product_stock, product_image from product where product_id = #{product_id}

select * from (select row_number() over(order by review_seq asc) as rownum, r.review_seq, r.review_content, u.user_nick, r.review_date, r.review_star from review as r, user as u where r.user_id = u.user_id and r.product_id = #{product_id}) A where rownum <= #{rowCount} and rownum >= #{start} order by rownum desc
select count(*) as totalCount from review where product_id = #{product_id}
select sum(review_star) as sumStar, count(review_star) as sumReview from review where product_id = #{product_id}
